import { useState } from "react" import "./body.css" const Body=()=>{ const [firstCardDisplay,setFirstCardDisplay] = useState(0) const cards = [ { front:"Step 1: Get Started", back:"Create an account with us and join/create a group" }, { front:"Step 2: Schedule new meetings", back:"Create a new meeting. Enter a length and date range for the meeting" }, { front:"Step 3: Invite your group members", back:"Invite your group members and wait for them to upload their availabilities" }, { front:"Step 4: Create a schedule", back:"Once everyone finishes uploading, our algorithm will generate which slot best fit the group's schedule" } ] return(

How Does LetsMeet Work?

Step 1: Get Started

Create an account with us and join/create a group

Step 2: Schedule new meetings

Create a new meeting. Enter a length and date range for the meeting

Step 3: Invite your group members

Invite your group members and wait for them to upload their availabilities

Step 4: Create a schedule

Once everyone finishes uploading, our algorithm will generate which slot best fit the group's schedule

) } export default Body
